daisyrVis 0.0.1.0000
  • Reference
    • Reading dlf files

Package index

All functions

Dlf-class Dlf
Class encapsulating Daisy log file (dlf) data
animate_depth_timeseries()
Animate a depth dependent timeseries from a Dlf file
daisy_time_to_timestamp()
Transform daisy time columns to a single timestamp
depth_wide_to_long()
Transform wide format time series to a long format time series It is assumed that dlf@body only contains time_name columns and depth columns with the format <var_name>_ e.g. "q_100"
dlf_to_csv()
Write a dlf object as a csv file
drop_dir_from_names()
Remove directory part from dlf names
plot_annual()
Make a bar plot of one or more variables from one or more dlfs
plot_daily()
Make a scatter plot of one or more variables from one or more dlfs
plot_many()
Plot one or more variables from one or more Dlfs with a user supplied geom. Each variable is plotted in a separate subplot.
read_dlf()
Read a dlf file (Daisy log file)
read_dlf_dir()
Walk a directory tree and read all dlf files in it.
strip_common_prefix_from_names()
Strip common prefix from dlf names

Developed by Silas Ørting.
